heading: HB03347
0: AN ACT AMENDING CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991 PERTAINING TO THE COMPOSITION OF LOCAL SPECIAL BODIES TO INCLUDE REPRESENTATION FROM THE SENIOR CITIZENS SECTOR AND THEREBY STRENGTHENING ITS PARTICIPATION IN COMMUNITY AFFAIRS AND DEVELOPMENT AND AFFIRMING ITS VALUABLE ROLE IN NATION BUILDING
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2016-08-31

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03347
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7160 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE OF 1991 PERTAINING TO THE COMPOSITION OF LOCAL SPECIAL BODIES TO INCLUDE REPRESENTATION FROM THE SENIOR CITIZENS SECTOR AND THEREBY STRENGTHENING ITS PARTICIPATION IN COMMUNITY AFFAIRS AND DEVELOPMENT AND AFFIRMING ITS VALUABLE ROLE IN NATION BUILDING

DATE FILED : 2016-08-25
